title: Georgia Senate 2026 - Day 4 AM Session 2
summary:
Here is a structured markdown summary of the Georgia Senate 2026 - Day 4 AM Session 2 session:

## Overview
This session focused on routine proceedings, with no major legislation introduced or passed. The session featured a morning devotion led by Pastor Anthony Booker, who provided a sermon emphasizing the importance of serving a higher purpose beyond just one's day-to-day work.

## Key Actions
None detected.

## Bills Introduced (First Reading)
- **SB 399**: To amend Article 3 of Chapter 11 of Title 31 of the Official Code of Georgia Annotated.
- **SB 400**: To amend Part 1A of Article 7 of Chapter 3 of Title 20 of the Official Code of Georgia Annotated relating to non-public, post-secondary educational institutions.
- **SR 574**: To recognize and commend the Susan Jolly Foundation and the Georgia Cancer Control Consortium.

## Notable Moments
- Pastor Anthony Booker delivered a sermon during the morning devotion, emphasizing the importance of serving a higher purpose beyond just one's day-to-day work.

## Votes
None recorded.

## Attendance
The session noted the excusal of several senators, including from the 35th, 10th, and 30th districts.

## Adjournment
The transcript does not explicitly state the time of adjournment or the date of the next session.
